	<script>
	var initGPT = function() {
		var gads = document.createElement("script");
		gads.async = true;

		node.parentNode.insertBefore(gads, node);

			googletag.pubads().disableInitialLoad();
		});


		if ($(window).width() < 659) {
			pbjs.bidderSettings = {
				audienceNetwork: {

							key: "fb_bidid",

						{

	<script>
		var time = 0 ;

	<script type="text/javascript">

		/**
		* Get the URL parameters
		* @param  {String} url The URL
		* @return {Object}     The URL parameters
		*/
		var getParams = function (url) {
			var params = {};
			var parser = document.createElement('a');
			parser.href = url;
			var query = parser.search.substring(1);
			var vars = query.split('&');
			for (var i = 0; i < vars.length; i++) {
				var pair = vars[i].split('=');
				params[pair[0]] = decodeURIComponent(pair[1]);
			}
			return params;
		};


		// Global variable
		// var g_page_type = 'article';
		var g_section = '';
		var g_sub_section = '';
		var g_content_id = '711600';
		var g_topic_id = '';
		var g_url_path = window.location.pathname.split('/');
		var g_window_width = window.innerWidth;
		var g_url_params = getParams(window.location.href);

		// Initial g_url_path index
		for (i = 0; i <= 5; i++) {
			if(typeof g_url_path[i] === 'undefined') g_url_path[i] = '';
		}

		if (g_content_id != '') {
			g_page_type = 'article';
			g_section = g_url_path[1];
			g_sub_section = g_url_path[2];
		} else if (g_url_path[1] == '') {
			g_page_type = 'homepage';
			g_section = 'homepage';
		} else if (g_url_path[2] != '') {
			g_page_type = 'sub_section';
			g_section = g_url_path[1];
			g_sub_section = g_url_path[2];
		} else {
			g_page_type = 'section';
			g_section = g_url_path[1];
		}

		var g_ad = {
			ad_type: '',
			get_ad_type : function() {
				var _t = this;
					var _width = g_window_width;
					if (_width >= 950) {
						_t.ad_type = "desktop";
					} else if (_width < 950 && _width >= 768) {
						_t.ad_type = "tablet";
					} else if (_width < 768 && _width >= 336) {
						_t.ad_type = "mobile";
					} else if (_width < 336) {
						_t.ad_type = "other";
					}
				return _t.ad_type;
			},
			get_gpt_slot : function(position, section) {

				var _t = this;
				var _slot = [];
				return _slot;
			},
			get_ad_section : function() {
				ad_section = g_section;
				if (ad_section == 'sports') {
					ad_section = 'sport';
				} else if (ad_section == 'vdo') {
					ad_section = 'video';
				} else if (ad_section == 'most-recent') {
					ad_section = 'mostrecent';
				} else if (ad_section == 'topstories') {
					ad_section = 'others';
				}
				return ad_section;
			}
		}


		var gptadslots = [];
		var googletag = googletag || {cmd:[]};
		var g_ad_type = g_ad.get_ad_type();
		// window.googletag = window.googletag || {cmd: []};
		var ad_section = g_ad.get_ad_section();

		
		var ad_slot_multi_0 = [];
		var add_size_inread_0 = [];
		var add_size_inread_1 = [];
		var add_size_inread2_0 = [];
		var add_size_inread2_1 = [];
		var add_size_multi_0 = [];
		var add_size_multi_1 = [];
		var ad_slot_inread_0 =[];
		var ad_slot_inread_1 =[];
		var add_size_leaderboard_0 = [];
		var add_size_hybrid_0 = [];
		var ad_slot_hybrid_0 = [];
		if (ad_section == 'homepage') {

				add_size_sticky_0 = [[336,280],[300,250]];
				add_size_sticky_1 = [[336,280],[300,250]];

				add_size_multi_0 = [[970,250],[970,90],[970,70],[728,90],[1200,250],[1200,90]];
				add_size_multi_1 = [[336,280],[300,250]];
				add_size_hybrid_1 = [[336,280],[300,250]];
				ad_slot_leaderboard_0 = [[970,250],[970,90],[970,70],[728,90],[1200,250],[1200,90]];
				ad_slot_hybrid_0 = [[970,250],[970,90],[970,70],[728,90],[1200,250],[1200,90]];
				if (g_ad.get_ad_type() == 'tablet') {
					ad_slot_hybrid_0 = [[728,90]];
					add_size_hybrid_0 = [[728,90]];
					add_size_leaderboard_0 = [[728,90]];

				}else if (g_ad.get_ad_type() == 'desktop'){
					ad_slot_hybrid_0 = [[970,250],[970,90],[970,70],[728,90],[1200,250],[1200,90]];
					add_size_hybrid_0 = [[970,250],[970,90],[970,70],[728,90],[1200,250],[1200,90]];
					add_size_leaderboard_0 = [[970,250],[970,90],[970,70],[728,90],[1200,250],[1200,90]];
				}
				ad_slot_multi_0 = [[970,250],[970,90],[970,70],[728,90],[1200,250],[1200,90]];
				ad_slot_sticky_0 = [[336,280],[300,250]];
			}else {

				add_size_hybrid_1 = [[1,1],[336,280],[300,250]];

				add_size_sticky_0 = [[1,1],[336,280],[300,600],[300,250]];
				add_size_sticky_1 = [[1,1],[336,280],[300,250]];

				ad_slot_leaderboard_0 = [[1,1],[970,250],[970,90],[970,70],[728,90],[1200,250],[1200,90]];
				if (g_ad.get_ad_type() == 'tablet') {
					ad_slot_hybrid_0 = [[1,1],[728,90]];
					add_size_hybrid_0 = [[1,1],[728,90]];
					add_size_leaderboard_0 = [[1,1],[728,90]];
				}else if (g_ad.get_ad_type() == 'desktop'){
					ad_slot_hybrid_0 = [[1,1],[970,250],[970,90],[970,70],[728,90],[1200,250],[1200,90]];
					add_size_hybrid_0 = [[1,1],[970,250],[970,90],[970,70],[728,90],[1200,250],[1200,90]];
					add_size_leaderboard_0 = [[1,1],[970,250],[970,90],[970,70],[728,90],[1200,250],[1200,90]];
				}
				ad_slot_sticky_0 = [[1,1],[336,280],[300,600],[300,250]];

				add_size_inread_0 = [[1,1],[336,280],[300,250],[640,360]];
				add_size_inread_1 = [[1,1],[300,250],[336,280]];

				add_size_inread2_0 = add_size_inread_0;
				add_size_inread2_1 = add_size_inread_1;
				ad_slot_inread_0 = [[1,1],[336,280],[300,250]];

				if (ad_section == 'business') {

					add_size_hybrid_1 = [[1,1],[336,280],[300,250]];

					add_size_sticky_0 = [[1,1],[336,280],[300,600],[300,250]];
					add_size_sticky_1 = [[1,1],[336,280],[300,250]];

					ad_slot_leaderboard_0 = [[1,1],[970,250],[970,90],[970,70],[728,90],[1200,250],[1200,90],[1600,250]];
					if (g_ad.get_ad_type() == 'tablet') {
						ad_slot_hybrid_0 = [[1,1],[728,90]];
						add_size_hybrid_0 = [[1,1],[728,90]];
						add_size_leaderboard_0 = [[1,1],[728,90]];
					}else if (g_ad.get_ad_type() == 'desktop'){
						ad_slot_hybrid_0 = [[1,1],[970,250],[970,90],[970,70],[728,90],[1200,250],[1200,90],[1600,250]];
						add_size_hybrid_0 = [[1,1],[970,250],[970,90],[970,70],[728,90],[1200,250],[1200,90],[1600,250]];
						add_size_leaderboard_0 = [[1,1],[970,250],[970,90],[970,70],[728,90],[1200,250],[1200,90],[1600,250]];
					}
					ad_slot_sticky_0 = [[1,1],[336,280],[300,600],[300,250]];

				}else
				if (ad_section == 'life' || ad_section == 'travel') {
					add_size_inread_0 = [[336,280],[300,250]];
					add_size_inread_1 = [[320,100],[300,250],[336,280],[250,250]];
					add_size_inread2_0 = add_size_inread_0;
					add_size_inread2_1 = add_size_inread_1;
					ad_slot_inread_0 = [[336,280],[300,250]];

				}

				if (g_page_type == 'article' && ad_section != 'video' && ad_section != 'photo' && g_url_path[2] != 'postbag') {
					// hybrid article
					//console.log('hybrid article : business');
					add_size_hybrid_0 = [[1,1],[336,280],[300,600],[300,250]];
					add_size_hybrid_1 = [[1,1],[336,280],[300,250]];
					ad_slot_hybrid_0 = [[1,1],[336,280],[300,600],[300,250]];

				}
				if (g_page_type == 'article' && ad_section == 'life' || ad_section == 'travel'){

						add_size_hybrid_1 = [[1,1],[336,280],[300,250]];
						if (g_ad.get_ad_type() == 'tablet') {
							ad_slot_hybrid_0 = [[728,90]];
							add_size_hybrid_0 = [[1,1],[728,90]];
						}else if (g_ad.get_ad_type() == 'desktop'){
							ad_slot_hybrid_0 = [[1,1],[970,250],[970,90],[970,70],[728,90],[1200,250],[1200,90]];
							add_size_hybrid_0 = [[1,1],[970,250],[970,90],[970,70],[728,90],[1200,250],[1200,90]];
						}
				}
				if(ad_section == 'life' && g_ad.get_ad_type() == 'mobile'){
					ad_slot_hybrid_0 = [[1,1],[336,280],[300,600],[300,250]];
				}
			}
		googletag.cmd.push(function() {
			var adUnits = [];
			/* Start size mapping, remove unused ad type */
			if (g_page_type == 'homepage'){
				var mappingleaderboard = googletag.sizeMapping()
									.addSize([800,600],add_size_leaderboard_0)
									.addSize([0,0],[320,100])
									.build();
			}else {
				var mappingleaderboard = googletag.sizeMapping()
									.addSize([800,600],add_size_leaderboard_0)
									.addSize([0,0],[320,100])
									.build();
				var mappingleaderboard1 = googletag.sizeMapping()
                            .addSize([800,600],[[1,1],[970,250],[970,90],[970,70],[728,90],[1200,250],[1200,90]])
                            .addSize([0,0],[[1,1],[300,250]])
                            .build();
			}

			 var mappinghybrid = googletag.sizeMapping()
									.addSize([800,600],add_size_hybrid_0)
									.addSize([0,0],add_size_hybrid_1)
									.build();

			var mappingsticky = googletag.sizeMapping()
									.addSize([800,600],add_size_sticky_0)
									.addSize([0,0],add_size_sticky_1)
									.build();

		   var mappinginread = googletag.sizeMapping()
								   .addSize([800,600],add_size_inread_0)
								   .addSize([0,0],add_size_inread_1)
								   .build();

			var mappinginread2 = googletag.sizeMapping()
								   .addSize([800,600],add_size_inread2_0)
								   .addSize([0,0],add_size_inread2_1)
								   .build();

			var mappingmulti = googletag.sizeMapping()
									.addSize([800,600],add_size_multi_0)
									.addSize([0,0],add_size_multi_1)
									.build();

			/* End size mapping */

			// leader board

			var leaderboard_size;
			if (g_ad_type == 'tablet') {
				leaderboard_size = [[728,90]];
			}else if (g_ad_type == 'desktop'){
				leaderboard_size = [[1,1],[970,250],[970,90],[970,70],[728,90],[1200,250],[1200,90]];
			}

			if(g_topic_id =='1752179'){
				//console.log('=>bkp_edu2019_lb');
				gptadslots.push(googletag.defineSlot('/2776261/bkp_edu2019_lb',
				leaderboard_size, 'div-gpt-ad-leaderboard-0')
				.setTargeting('unit_type', ['leaderboard'])
				.defineSizeMapping(mappingleaderboard)
				.addService(googletag.pubads()));

			} else if(g_topic_id =='1802499'){

				//console.log('topics lb bangkokpost_event : topic_id 1802499');
				gptadslots.push(googletag.defineSlot('/2776261/bangkokpost_event/leaderboard',
				leaderboard_size, 'div-gpt-ad-leaderboard-0')
				.setTargeting('unit_type', ['leaderboard'])
				.defineSizeMapping(mappingleaderboard)
				.addService(googletag.pubads()));

			} else if(g_topic_id =='1824599'){

				// console.log('mappingleaderboard: ' + mappingleaderboard);
				// console.log('topics lb bangkokpost_wsj/WSJ_BP_LB1 : topic_id 1824599');
				gptadslots.push(googletag.defineSlot('/2776261/bangkokpost_wsj/WSJ_BP_LB1', [[728, 90], [970, 90], [1200, 90], [970, 250], [1, 1], [1200, 250]], 'div-gpt-ad-leaderboard-0')
				.setTargeting('unit_type', ['leaderboard'])
				.defineSizeMapping(mappingleaderboard)
				.addService(googletag.pubads()));
				if (g_ad.get_ad_type() == 'desktop'){

			get_member_login: function(_callback) {

				var _t = this;

				if (_t._is_get_login_calling == 2) {
					// Callback all

					});
					_t._callback_login = [];
					return true;

							_t.avatar = data.user_avatar;

							_t.is_member_login = true;
						}

						_t._is_get_login_calling = 2;

						// Callback all
						$.each(_t._callback_login, function(k, v) {
							v();
						});
						_t._callback_login = [];

					}, "json");
				}
			}
		}

				var position;
				var scrollPosition = j(this).scrollTop();
				j(this).scroll(function(){
				var scrollTop = j(this).scrollTop();
				if(scrollPosition < scrollTop)
					position = "up"
				else
					position = "down"
				scrollPosition = scrollTop;
				callback(position);
				});
			};

	<script type="text/javascript">
	var g_truehits_options = {
			strictMode: false,
			key: ["source", "protocol", "authority", "userInfo", "user", "password", "host", "port", "relative", "path", "directory", "file", "query", "anchor"],
			q: {
				name: "queryKey",
				parser: /(?:^|&)([^&=]*)=?([^&]*)/g
			},
			parser: {
				strict: /^(?:([^:\/?#]+):)?(?:\/\/((?:(([^:@]*)(?::([^:@]*))?)?@)?([^:\/?#]*)(?::(\d*))?))?((((?:[^?#\/]*\/)*)([^?#]*))(?:\?([^#]*))?(?:#(.*))?)/,
				loose: /^(?:(?![^:@]+:[^:@\/]*@)([^:\/?#.]+):)?(?:\/\/)?((?:(([^:@]*)(?::([^:@]*))?)?@)?([^:\/?#]*)(?::(\d*))?)(((\/(?:[^?#](?![^?#\/]*\.[^?#\/.]+(?:[?#]|$)))*\/?)?([^?#\/]*))(?:\?([^#]*))?(?:#(.*))?)/
			}
	}

	var g_truehits = {
			var_default_name : "homepage",
			fn_parseUri : function (str){
				var o = g_truehits_options;
				m = o.parser[o.strictMode ? "strict" : "loose"].exec(str);
				uri = {};
				i = 14;

				while (i--) uri[o.key[i]] = m[i] || "";

				uri[o.q.name] = {};
				uri[o.key[12]].replace(o.q.parser, function($0, $1, $2) {
					if ($1) uri[o.q.name][$1] = $2;
				});

				return uri;
			},

			fn_decode: function(encoded){
				return decodeURIComponent(encoded.replace(/\+/g, " "));
			},
			fn_getTruehitsName : function (){
				var this_url = this.fn_parseUri(window.location.href + '');
				var page = '';

				var paths = this.fn_decode(this_url['directory']).split('/');
				var paths_length = paths.length - 2;
				if (paths_length > 0) {
					if (paths_length >= 1) {
						page = paths[1];
						if (paths[2] != ''){
							if(isNaN(paths[2])) {
								//page = page + '_' + paths[2];
								if(!isNaN(paths[3])) {
									page = page + "_article";
								}
							}else{
								if(page == "photo"){
									page = page + "_view";
								}else{
									page = page + "_article";
								}
							}
						}
					}else {
						page = paths[1];
					}
				}else {
					page = paths[1] || this_url['file'];
				}

				if (page == '') page = this.var_default_name || "homepage";
				page = page.toUpperCase();
				page = "NEWDESIGN_"+page;
				return page;
			}
	}

	// Refresh เมื่อ resize ไปมาเพื่อแก้ปัญหา ad แสดงผลผิดพลาด
	var g_current_ad_type = g_ad_type;

	$( window ).resize(function() {

		var _ad_type = g_ad.get_ad_type();
		if (_ad_type != g_current_ad_type) {
			location.reload();

	});
	googletag.pubads().refresh();

	function sendAdserverRequest() {
				if(pbjs.adserverRequestSent) return;
				pbjs.adserverRequestSent = true;

			}
		/* end nexus */

											Myawaddy industrial zone set for 2017 opening										</h2>

																																				<p>writer: <a href="http://search.bangkokpost.com/search/result_advanced?category=news&columnistName=Myanmar+Times"><span>

											</div>

									<div class="articl-content">
																					<div class="box-img">
												<figure>
													<img data-img-highlight="1" src="https://static.bangkokpost.com/media/content/20150929/c1_711600.jpg" alt="The Mae Sot checkpoint in Tak province is a main trade point between Thailand and Myanmar and is 11 kilometres from the Myawaddy industrial zone. (Photo by Patipat Janthong)" title="The Mae Sot checkpoint in Tak province is a main trade point between Thailand and Myanmar and is 11 kilometres from the Myawaddy industrial zone. (Photo by Patipat Janthong)" />
												</figure>
																								<figcaption>
													The Mae Sot checkpoint in Tak province is a main trade point between Thailand and Myanmar and is 11 kilometres from the Myawaddy industrial zone. (Photo by Patipat Janthong)												</figcaption>
												
											</div>
																				<p>An industrial zone under development in Myawaddy is expected to open in fiscal year 2017, according to officials.</p>
<p>The Myawaddy industrial zone in Kayin state is being built on a 201-acre site between Myawaddy and Thingan Nyi Naung, just 11 kilometres from the Thai-Myanmar border in Mae Sot district in Tak province.</p>

<p>“The state government hasn’t set a time limit on the project, but it will mostly be ready in 2016 to 2017,” Kayin State’s Minister for Industry Saw Kyi Lin told the<em> <a href="http://www.mmtimes.com/index.php/business/16731-myawaddy-industrial-zone-set-for-2017-opening.html" target="_blank">Myanmar Times</a></em>.</p>

<p>When the local government granted Nyi Naung Oo Co a land lease in 2013 to build the zone, it was set to be used for regional industry.</p>

<p>However, it has since been reclassified as an economic zone at the advice of the Myanmar Investment Commission (MIC) because of its proximity to the Thai border.</p>

<p>Under the 2012 Foreign Investment Law, foreign business is forbidden within 16 kilometres of Myanmar’s borders with neighbouring countries, unless in an industrial zone that has been approved by the MIC.</p>

<p>The zone has since seen an influx of applications from Thailand, mostly in partnership with local companies based in Myawaddy, said Saw Kyi Lin.</p>

<p>The nearby border crossing to Mae Sot in Thailand is Myanmar’s second busiest overland trade point, after Muse in Shan state on the border with China.</p>

<p>Basic amenities are 90% complete, according to Nyi Naung Oo’s project director Kyaw Tint. He added that 450 plots have been demarcated and that at least 15 factory owners have applied, mostly in the garment and consumer goods sectors.</p>

<p>A shoe factory, an automobile spare parts manufacturer and a galvanised iron sheet factory are among those hoping to start business, he said.</p>

<p>Myawaddy is one of three industrial zone projects in Kayin state, along with the Payathonsu industrial zone and the Hpa-an industrial zone – a 100-acre industrial park which opened to foreign investors earlier this year.</p>

<p>The project was intended to be completed within five years, but was delayed due to a lack of electricity and regional instability.</p>

<p>Saw Kyi Lin dispelled concerns about whether the infrastructure at the Myawaddy industrial zone would be up to scratch, saying that it benefits from 24-hour electricity from neighbouring Thailand.</p>

<p>“Thailand’s electricity is better than Myanmar’s and there will be a guaranteed 24-hour supply,” he said.</p>

<p>Nyi Naung Oo has applied for MIC permission to buy electricity from Thailand and is in discussions with Thailand’s Enova Power to supply electricity to the entire zone, said U Kyaw Tint.</p>

<p>The developer began selling land plots late last year and also offers leases to foreigners, as they cannot purchase property under Myanmar law.</p>

<script type="text/javascript">
	if ($(".box-diary-info").length) {
		var elm_today_info_tab;
		var count_tab_today_info;
		var today_info_delay = 10000;
		var today_info_interval;

		(function($, window, document) {
			/* Jquery ready here */
			elm_today_info_tab = $(".box-diary-info .tab-slider--trigger");
			count_tab_today_info = elm_today_info_tab.length;
			today_info_interval = setInterval(slide_today_info, today_info_delay);
		}(window.jQuery, window, document));

		function slide_today_info() {
			for (i = 0; i < count_tab_today_info; i++) {
				if (elm_today_info_tab.eq(i).hasClass('active')) {
					break;
				}
			}
			if (i >= (count_tab_today_info - 1)) {
				i = 0;
			} else {
				i++;
			}
			elm_today_info_tab.eq(i).trigger("click");
		}

		$(".box-diary-info")
			.mouseenter(function() {
				clearInterval(today_info_interval);
			})
			.mouseleave(function() {
				today_info_interval = setInterval(slide_today_info, today_info_delay);
			});
	}

<script type='text/javascript'>
var is_bkp_newdesign_switched = null;

function get_cookie_bkp_newdesign(name) {
	var v = document.cookie.match('(^|;) ?' + name + '=([^;]*)(;|$)');
	return v ? v[2] : null;
}

function accept_bkp_newdesign_switched() {
	var d = new Date;
	d.setTime(d.getTime() + 31536000000); // 1 year
	document.cookie = "is_bkp_newdesign_switched=1;domain=bangkokpost.com;path=/;expires=" + d.toGMTString();	
}

function check_bkp_newdesign_switched() {
	var is_bkp_newdesign_switched = get_cookie_bkp_newdesign('is_bkp_newdesign_switched');
	if (!is_bkp_newdesign_switched) show_bkp_newdesign_bar();
}

function go_bkp_old_newdesign() {
	accept_bkp_newdesign_switched();
	location="https://www.bangkokpost.com?olddesign=1";
}

function close_bkp_newdesign_bar() {
	accept_bkp_newdesign_switched();
	document.getElementById("beta-banner").remove();

    if (!e.namespace) return;
    var carousel = e.relatedTarget,
        current = carousel.current();
    if (current === carousel.maximum()) {
     $(".owl-topics.owl-carousel .owl-stage").addClass("pos-right");
    }else if (current === carousel.minimum()){

text:
Myawaddy industrial zone set for 2017 opening

The Mae Sot checkpoint in Tak province is a main trade point between Thailand and Myanmar and is 11 kilometres from the Myawaddy industrial zone. (Photo by Patipat Janthong)

An industrial zone under development in Myawaddy is expected to open in fiscal year 2017, according to officials.

The Myawaddy industrial zone in Kayin state is being built on a 201-acre site between Myawaddy and Thingan Nyi Naung, just 11 kilometres from the Thai-Myanmar border in Mae Sot district in Tak province.

“The state government hasn’t set a time limit on the project, but it will mostly be ready in 2016 to 2017,” Kayin State’s Minister for Industry Saw Kyi Lin told the Myanmar Times.

When the local government granted Nyi Naung Oo Co a land lease in 2013 to build the zone, it was set to be used for regional industry.

However, it has since been reclassified as an economic zone at the advice of the Myanmar Investment Commission (MIC) because of its proximity to the Thai border.

Under the 2012 Foreign Investment Law, foreign business is forbidden within 16 kilometres of Myanmar’s borders with neighbouring countries, unless in an industrial zone that has been approved by the MIC.

The zone has since seen an influx of applications from Thailand, mostly in partnership with local companies based in Myawaddy, said Saw Kyi Lin.

The nearby border crossing to Mae Sot in Thailand is Myanmar’s second busiest overland trade point, after Muse in Shan state on the border with China.

Basic amenities are 90% complete, according to Nyi Naung Oo’s project director Kyaw Tint. He added that 450 plots have been demarcated and that at least 15 factory owners have applied, mostly in the garment and consumer goods sectors.

A shoe factory, an automobile spare parts manufacturer and a galvanised iron sheet factory are among those hoping to start business, he said.

Myawaddy is one of three industrial zone projects in Kayin state, along with the Payathonsu industrial zone and the Hpa-an industrial zone – a 100-acre industrial park which opened to foreign investors earlier this year.

The project was intended to be completed within five years, but was delayed due to a lack of electricity and regional instability.

Saw Kyi Lin dispelled concerns about whether the infrastructure at the Myawaddy industrial zone would be up to scratch, saying that it benefits from 24-hour electricity from neighbouring Thailand.

“Thailand’s electricity is better than Myanmar’s and there will be a guaranteed 24-hour supply,” he said.

Nyi Naung Oo has applied for MIC permission to buy electricity from Thailand and is in discussions with Thailand’s Enova Power to supply electricity to the entire zone, said U Kyaw Tint.

The developer began selling land plots late last year and also offers leases to foreigners, as they cannot purchase property under Myanmar law.
title: Myawaddy industrial zone set for 2017 opening
